msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. Except the broken parts, Regularly cut at the top, badly damaged at the bottom. kollesis at the middle of the column. Some spots of salt on the Recto and Verso. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Sisois, son of Karanos, grandson of Heraklas, mother Artemis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 229)
Kastor, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Pamonneios, son of Anchorimphis, grandson of Pamonneios, mother Didymarion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. )
Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 182)
Isas, son of Tiberius (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 178)
Aphrodisios, son of Apion (Krampys Bakchiotes) (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 157)
Didymos son of Maron
(see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 161)
Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 164)
Psenesis, son of Pharmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Kastor slave of Aphrodous, daughter of Dios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Protarchos, son of Leonides, grandson of Anchophis, mother Herais (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 215)
Ptolemaios, son of Artemidoros, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 245)
Priskos alias Pasoxis, son of Satabous, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thermouthis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 215)
Petheus alias Karanos, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tasokmenis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 204)
Horos, son of Chairemon, grandson of Horos, mother Stotoetis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Ptolemaios the brother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 216)
Ptolemaios, son of Leonides, grandson of Papeis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 217)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

keywords.term: Karanis Palanis, previously (called) Ioukoundes and Chresmos;the property of Germanikaines;the property of Antonianes

of Pamonneios, mother Didymarion, the administrator fee;;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, the administrator fee . . drachmas;;Isas, son of Tiberius;;{in the left margin: 696 drachmas, 15 obols from Sarap () 300 drachmas, 15 obols} tax sheep for the 13th year of Karanis Palanis, previously (called) Ioukoundes and Chresmos 428 drachmas, surcharges 27 drachmas, 5 obols, the total 455 drachmas, 5 obols;;the property of Germanikaines, also 141 drachmas, surcharges 9 drachmas, the total 150 drachmas;;the property of Antonianes, 75 drachmas, surcharges 5 drachmas, the total 80 drachmas;;Papos alias Chaireas;;{in the left margin: deposit of Sarap() sheet 43, 60 drachmas} orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira 24 drachmas, 2.5 obols, 2 chalkoi, tax on the produce of olive oil 3 drachmas, 2.5 obols, 2 chalkoi, naubion 2 drachmas, 2.5 obols, 2 chalkoi, surcharges 6 drachmas, 0.5 obol;;eparourion 16 drachmas, 2 obols, surcharges 1 drachma, 2 obols, 2 chalkoi, kollybos 5.5 obols, the total 55 drachmas, 0.5 obol;;geometria for the 12th year 3 drachmas, 4.5 obols, surcharges 1.5 obol, the total 4 drachmas;;the total for the day 796 drachmas, 6 obols;;the 17th of the same (month);;Aphrodisios, son of Apion (Krampys Bakchiotes);;{in the left margin: 12 drachmas, 25 obols} orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira 2 drachmas, 3 obols, tax on the produce of olive oil 2 obols, 2 chalkoi, naubion 1.5 obol, surcharges 3.5 obols, 2 chalkoi, eparourion 1 drachma, 4 obols, surcharges 1 obol, kollybos 0.5 obol, 2 chalkoi, the total 5 drachmas, 4 obols, 2 chalkoi;;and Didymos son of Maron;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira 1 drachma, 4 obols, tax on the produce of olive oil, 1.5 obols, naubion 1 obol, surcharges 2.5 obols, eparourion 1 drachma, 0.5 obol, 2 chalkoi, surcharges 0.5 obol, 2 chalkoi, kollybos 0.5 obol, the total 3 drachmas, 5 obols;;geometria for the 12th year 4 drachmas, 1 obol, surcharges 1.5 obols, 2 chalkoi, the total 4 drachmas, 2.5 obols, 2 chalkoi;;Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema, the remaining the administrator fee;;Psenesis, son of Pharmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, the administrator fee 4 drachmas;;Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, the administrator fee 4 drachmas 28 obols;;Kastor slave of Aphrodous, daughter of Dios, Pnepheros, mother Thermouthis, the administrator fee 12 drachmas;;The total for the day 72 drachmas, 27 obols;;The 18th of the same (month);;Petheus alias Karanos, son of Sokmenis, grandson of
